entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
